replies.msg: Keith Grant, the Mavs' assistant GM, was sequestered in a banquet  room during the Draft Lottery. Grant said as the ping-pong balls were jumping: "The first three drawings, Phoenix won them all. So they had to re-draft for second twice. Phoenix won it three times in a row."

replies.msg: Atlanta will likely gladly "settle" for whoever is left for them between Luka Doncic and Marvin Bagley. We've been hearing for a while now they are very high on Bagley in particular. Trae Young would have likely gotten a strong look had they landed outside of the top three.
